title: Harris vs Trump: When And Where To Watch The US Presidential Debate
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and his Democratic rival Kamala Harris will take the stage for their first televised debate today.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and his Democratic rival Kamala Harris will take the stage for their first televised debate today.

title: These Are The 5 Rules Of Kamala Harris vs Donald Trump Debate
content: Top runners for the US presidential race, Kamala Harris and Donald Trump, will face off in their first-ever debate tomorrow. The much-anticipated debate has specific rules in place.

title: UAE Inks Pact For India To Operate Nuclear Power Plants In Gulf Nation
content: The United Aarb Emirates or UAE has inked an agreement with India that provides a framework for giving services for operation and maintenance of nuclear power plants in the emirate.
summary: The United Aarb Emirates or UAE has inked an agreement with India that provides a framework for giving services for operation and maintenance of nuclear power plants in the emirate.

title: Dog Strollers Outsell Baby Strollers In Country With Lowest Birth Rate
content: Data from Gmarket shows that 57% of strollers sold this year are for pets, highlighting a significant shift as the countrys fertility rate hits a record low of 0.72.
summary: Data from Gmarket shows that 57% of strollers sold this year are for pets, highlighting a significant shift as the countrys fertility rate hits a record low of 0.72.

title: 6 Asteroids On Collision Course With Earth, First One May Hit In October
content: Asteroid Bennu, discovered in 1999, currently poses the greatest risk of impacting our planet.
summary: Asteroid Bennu, discovered in 1999, currently poses the greatest risk of impacting our planet.

title: BMW Recalls 1.5 Million Cars Over Faulty Brakes
content: BMW said Tuesday it was recalling about 1.5 million vehicles due to problems with their brakes and cut its outlook for the year, sending the German luxury carmaker's shares tumbling.
summary: BMW said Tuesday it was recalling about 1.5 million vehicles due to problems with their brakes and cut its outlook for the year, sending the German luxury carmaker's shares tumbling.

title: In Pics: Apple Launches iPhone 16 Lineup, AirPods And More
content: Tech giant Apple on Monday introduced new the new iPhone 16 series enabled with artificial intelligence, larger display sizes, a new camera control button and a big leap in battery life.
summary: Tech giant Apple on Monday introduced new the new iPhone 16 series enabled with artificial intelligence, larger display sizes, a new camera control button and a big leap in battery life.

title: Gen Z Rejects 9-5 Jobs, 76% Aim To Be Their Own Boss: Poll
content: A recent poll reveals that 76% of Generation Z, compared to 57% of millennials and lower percentages of Gen X and baby boomers, prefer entrepreneurship over traditional 9-5 jobs.
summary: A recent poll reveals that 76% of Generation Z, compared to 57% of millennials and lower percentages of Gen X and baby boomers, prefer entrepreneurship over traditional 9-5 jobs.

title: Opinion: G20 Or COP29, West Will Keep Choosing Politics Over Climate
content: While US ambivalence on international commitments for climate change is known, the Europeans, who project themselves as champions of climate action, are now prevaricating too.
summary: While US ambivalence on international commitments for climate change is known, the Europeans, who project themselves as champions of climate action, are now prevaricating too.

title: Canada Man Spots Suspicious Pit On Google Maps, Experts Say It Could Be...
content: Experts now believe the suspicious pit may be a massive crater created by an ancient meteor.
summary: Experts now believe the suspicious pit may be a massive crater created by an ancient meteor.

title: Lotions, Sunscreens Linked To Hormonal Disruptions In Children, Study Finds
content: A new study links personal care products like lotions and hair conditioners to elevated levels of endocrine-disrupting chemicals called phthalates in young children.
summary: A new study links personal care products like lotions and hair conditioners to elevated levels of endocrine-disrupting chemicals called phthalates in young children.

title: Hamas No Longer Exists As A Military Formation: Israel Defence Minister
content: Israeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant offered his support for a hostage release agreement in the first phase of a Gaza truce deal, saying it would give Israel a "strategic opportunity" to address other security challenges.
summary: Israeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant offered his support for a hostage release agreement in the first phase of a Gaza truce deal, saying it would give Israel a "strategic opportunity" to address other security challenges.

title: Video: Remote Surgery Conducted 9,000 KM Away Using Game Controller
content: Researchers from ETH Zurich and CU Medicine successfully performed a teleoperated magnetic endoscopy on a swine model, with a remote specialist in Zurich using a video game controller.
summary: Researchers from ETH Zurich and CU Medicine successfully performed a teleoperated magnetic endoscopy on a swine model, with a remote specialist in Zurich using a video game controller.

title: Thousands Plead For Help As Death Count In Typhoon-hit Vietnam Rises To 82
content: Thousands of people were stranded on rooftops and posted desperate pleas for help on social media Tuesday after severe flooding in parts of typhoon-hit Vietnam, as the death count climbed to 82.
summary: Thousands of people were stranded on rooftops and posted desperate pleas for help on social media Tuesday after severe flooding in parts of typhoon-hit Vietnam, as the death count climbed to 82.

title: Chinese Company To Lose Rs 35 Crore After Washing Machine Pricing Error
content: The incident happened on the evening of August 28, when Little Swan's online shop received over 40,000 orders in just 20 minutes, after customers noticed exceptionally low prices on washing machines.
summary: The incident happened on the evening of August 28, when Little Swan's online shop received over 40,000 orders in just 20 minutes, after customers noticed exceptionally low prices on washing machines.

title: Ahead Of Trump Debate, Kamala Harris' Border, Abortion Policies In Spotlight
content: Kamala Harris has unveiled a few centrist-leaning policies, abandoned some past positions and left much else vague as she gears up for a critical US presidential debate with Donald Trump.
summary: Kamala Harris has unveiled a few centrist-leaning policies, abandoned some past positions and left much else vague as she gears up for a critical US presidential debate with Donald Trump.

title: EU Top Court Triumphs In Crackdown On Apple's Tax Deal, Google's Practices
content: The EU's top court on Tuesday delivered two major victories in the bloc's battle against tech giants by ruling against Apple and Google in separate legal sagas with billions of euros at play.
summary: The EU's top court on Tuesday delivered two major victories in the bloc's battle against tech giants by ruling against Apple and Google in separate legal sagas with billions of euros at play.

title: SpaceX Launches 4-Member Civilian Crew For First Privately-funded Spacewalk
content: SpaceX launched its daring Polaris Dawn mission on Tuesday, a multiday orbital expedition carrying a four-member civilian crew for the first spacewalk by non-professional astronauts.
summary: SpaceX launched its daring Polaris Dawn mission on Tuesday, a multiday orbital expedition carrying a four-member civilian crew for the first spacewalk by non-professional astronauts.

title: South Korea Summit Announces 'Blueprint' For Using AI In The Military
content: Among the details added in the document was the need to prevent AI from being used to proliferate weapons of mass destruction (WMD)
summary: Among the details added in the document was the need to prevent AI from being used to proliferate weapons of mass destruction (WMD)

title: Video: Bridge Collapses In Typhoon-Hit Vietnam, Vehicles Plunge Into River
content: A bridge in northern Vietnam's Phu Tho province collapsed on Monday morning as the region faced the devastating impact of typhoon Yagi.
summary: A bridge in northern Vietnam's Phu Tho province collapsed on Monday morning as the region faced the devastating impact of typhoon Yagi.
